subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter led the Liberty with 31 points, lifting the team to a victory over the Sun. The game gave the Liberty the No. 2 seed in the W.N.B.A. playoffs.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter led the Liberty with 31 points, lifting the team to a victory over the Sun. The game gave the Liberty the No. 2 seed in the W.N.B.A. playoffs.
